ISSUE.TITLE: Make it possible to set the path to projects.cfg using an environment variable
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: As noted in #195, it should be possible to set the path to `projects.cfg` using an environment variable, e.g. export ANNIF_PROJECTS=/etc/annif/projects.cfg annif analyze tfidf-fi <doc.txt

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Make it possible to set ANNIF_DATADIR and ANNIF_PROJECTS using environment variables. Fixes #211
